subject: Football
Prostate Gland
Cancer
lead_paragraph: Dallas Cowboys quarterback Tony Romo’s father has prostate cancer. Ramiro Romo, 50, found out he had cancer days after he and his wife were at Soldier Field in Chicago on Sept. 23, when Tony threw for 329 yards with 2 touchdowns in a 34-10 victory.
